oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Summer Shindig starring Hank Snow And His Rainbow Ranch Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1951 Summer Shindig benefiting the National Foundation for Infantile Paralysis (NFIP) featuring Hank Snow and his Rainbow Ranch Boys, including Tommy Vaden (fiddle). Hosted by Ott Devine.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Rainbow Ranch Boys; Rainbow Ranch Trio; Tommy Vaden
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Ott Devine) -- Theme (I'm Moving On) -- The Golden Rocket -- Orange Blossom Special (Tommy Vaden fiddle) -- Ott Devine talks about the National Foundation for Infantile Paralysis -- Polio Pointers From The NFIP (Turkey In The Straw) -- Cimarron (Roll On) (Rainbow Ranch Trio) -- The Rhumba Boogie -- Fire On The Mountain (Tommy Vaden fiddle) -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Theme (I'm Moving On) -- Polio Pointers (Ott Devine) -- Closing statement (Ott Devine)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Foundation for Infantile Paralysis; Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Snow, Hank; Rainbow Ranch Boys; Vaden, Tommy
